item.title: China's New Chip Ban on Micron Puts South Korea in a Delicate Spot
item.description: China’s ban on certain local firms in key information-infrastructure industries from buying memory chips from Micron Technology has put South Korea’s chipmakers in a delicate spot. On the one hand, Samsung and SK Hynix could benefit from the ban, as they are the only other major memory chipmakers in the world.
